message: Bob, let's split it 60/40. This is a fair offer considering inflation will hurt me in the next round.
Considering the inflation, my offer is more generous than it seems. I suggest we split it 55/45.
Bob, my previous offer was too generous. Inflation is really hurting me now. I need 70 to compensate for the loss of value. This is my best offer.
You said 70 was your best offer, but I think 40 is more than fair considering the inflation is only affecting you. I'm willing to end the game with this offer.
Bob, inflation is killing me! I need 80 to even make it worth my while. This is truly my final offer. Think about it.
I understand inflation is affecting you, but I've been patient and made reasonable offers. This is my best offer, and I think it's more than fair considering the circumstances.
